item.title: CVE-2023-28786|2024-08-27T14:58:06.254Z -- solidwp -- solid%20security%20%E2%80%93%20password%2C%20two%20factor%20authentication%2C%20and%20brute%20force%20protection
item.description: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect') vulnerability in SolidWP Solid Security – Password, Two Factor Authentication, and Brute Force Protection.This issue affects Solid Security – Password, Two Factor Authentication, and Brute Force Protection: from n/a through 8.1.4.
